file_insights.changes_summary: Updated two functions (updateProfile and createProfile) to support optional skills and interests fields

patterns_discovered: Consistent type handling for optional fields
Array-based storage for skills and interests
gotchas_discovered: Ensure database schema matches these new optional array fields
Handle potential type conversion when storing skills/interests

approach_outcome.changes_implemented: Added skills and interests support to profile management functions

recommendations: Validate input types for skills and interests
Add client-side validation for maximum number of skills/interests
Consider adding default empty array handling
